acf.heading: Get methocarbamol online.
acf.first_paragraph: Muscle pain and bone pain can be detrimental to day-to-day life. Further issues and complications can arise without proper treatment.

accordion.accordion_title: What is methocarbamol and how does it work?
accordion.accordion_intro: Methocarbamol (frequently known as Robaxin) is a muscle relaxant primarily used to relieve short-term bone or muscle pain. It is used in conjunction with other forms of treatment in addition to rest, and works by preventing pain sensations to be sent to the brain.
accordion.accordion_content: If you think you need methocarbamol, you can speak to a doctor on Maple to see if it’s right for you and get a prescription.

accordion.accordion_title: What are the uses for methocarbamol?
accordion.accordion_intro: Methocarbamol is used to relieve short-term bone and muscle pain. An example of this can include muscle spasms.
accordion.accordion_content: If you’re not sure if you need methocarbamol, doctors on Maple can help diagnose your condition and determine what treatment is necessary.

accordion.accordion_intro: Methocarbamol typically comes in tablet form. It should be taken as per a doctor’s recommendations but is usually taken 4 times a day. Initial dosages are typically 1500mg and maintenance dosages are typically 1000 mg.
accordion.accordion_content: For children, these dosages can vary dramatically, so it is very important to consult with a doctor to see what is right for you.

accordion.accordion_title: What are the side effects and risks of methocarbamol?
accordion.accordion_intro: Methocarbamol may cause skin issues such as discolouration and rashes. Additionally, other side effects such as headaches, dark urine, nausea, and others may occur.
accordion.accordion_content: It is important to speak with a doctor if any of these side effects persist.

accordion.accordion_intro: Methocarbamol is not recommended to those who are pregnant, or have liver or kidney issues as it may aggravate it further.
accordion.accordion_content: If you have any questions about the medication, you can speak to a doctor on Maple by registering for an account.
